amendment.description: To modify certain additional authorities for purposes of the targeted shaping of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4512 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4512 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6354-6355) To modify certain additional authorities for purposes of the targeted shaping of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4512 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4512 proposed by Senator Warner.
